column4: hello...i cannot see anymore my sound card...whereas i see it under windows
what sound card?
: i ve an a6vc laptop
...what sound card?
: this is a intel chipset relteck
is it an HDA (high def audio) chipset?
yes
sec
it used to work perfectly...since the latest automatic update, it does not work anymore
what was modified in the update?
: but I have compiled again the alsa-modules against the newx headers
uname -r
that's truncated; I need the full uname -r
cat /proc/asound/version
use pastebin if more than one line
hmmmm I'm not in front of my home coputer
you need to have at least ssh access to the Ubuntu Breezy install
: i have installed the alsa drivers
please be more precise.
: sorry....i cannot connect to my home computer
it is nearly impossible to assist you in troubleshooting if you don't have at least ssh access to the Ubuntu Breezy install. Please try again later.
ok...thanks anyway
